Story:

June 12, 1892 ... A young 15 year old guy Ray Thompson was on the street.
What to feed himself, he began to steal food.
After weeks of wandering Ray stopped to look at life in paints, the world seemed to him gloomy and scary.
Forces were on the wane. Ray could no longer exist, he just lay down and fell asleep.
In the morning pass by an old abandoned cabin in the convoy saw the boy
located on the rotting hay sheltered dirty cloth.
Attempts to wake the boy was inconsolable. He was no longer in this world. Ray died.
